product_name: Pacsafe Venturesafe 300 GII Vertical Travel Bag - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Get off the beaten track in confidence with this travel bag. You'll explore with reassurance knowing your laptop and other valuables are well protected from pickpockets and bag snatchers.
